title: Chippa United incredibly announce 16 new signings
excerpt: DStv Premiership side Chippa United have taken the drastic step in preparing for the upcoming season by announcing an incredible 16 signings in a massive squad overhaul.
author: Staff Writer

title: SA star bids farewell to Moroccan club
excerpt: Former SuperSport United striker Darren Smith has bid farewell to Moroccan side FAR Rabat.
author: Staff Writer

title: Chippa survive FIFA transfer ban
excerpt: Chippa United have adhered to the FIFA ruling ordering them to pay Nigerian forward Augustine Chidi Kwem all his dues to avoid a transfer ban being imposed.
author: Staff Writer

title: Sundowns set to announce Williams capture imminently
excerpt: Bafana Bafana captain Ronwen Williams looks set to be announced by DStv Premiership champions Mamelodi Sundowns imminently from rivals SuperSport United.
author: Staff Writer

title: MLS club eyes Messi signing
excerpt: An executive at a Major League Soccer (MLS) club has stated that they will try to sign Paris Saint-Germain superstar Lionel Messi if the opportunity arises.
author: Staff Writer
